attributes.action: make a profound apology to the memory of Enoch Powell, on behalf of ALL the politicians (of all shades), alive and dead, who poo-pooed his forecasts of racial discord and strife in the UK in his Rivers of Blood speech in 1968 - EVERY word of which has since been proven to be accurate in the UK of today (8th March 2008).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Enoch Powell is, undoutedly, the ONLY british politician who has ever spoken the truth about immigration into the UK.  To be against immigration is not racist, to be against immigration on the scale facilitated by our present political representatives is common sense.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
